title: Internet Issues

embed.description: This means you cannot send email via SMTP to arbitrary mail servers. Such blocking is a common countermeasure against malware abusing infected machines for generating spam. Your ISP likely provides a specific mail server that is permitted. Also, webmail services remain unaffected.

body:
Lately i have been experiencing high ping while playing many games and i do not understand why.
I am currently on NBN and use to get speedtest of ~90Mb/s and now only getting ~6Mb/s. (I am not capped either)
ISP: Telstra Bigpond.
I linked a Net Analysis above. 

Could anyone explain to me what is wrong with my net?

replies.body:
You may want to remove that link to your net log. It contains your IP address, which can be used for malicious activities.

After a quick review, it seems that your adapter is having problems with IPv6. [Here are instructions on how to disable IPv6 and use IPv4](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4), which should fix your problem. Remember to reboot your computer afterward.

If you need any help with doing that, just ask.
